name: Your Own Worst Enemy (GomadLlama)
description:
Your Own Worst Enemy is my entry into VImJam 2021. The Core concept is that you build your own boss, by selecting different combinations of "mutations". The more mutations the more Exp and Coins you get, but also the harder it becomes. The game will test your skill, reaction, and luck. The Experience points are used for leveling while. Coins allow the player to but their own mutations to make them stronger.  There are also some secrets to find. Beware this game is a little tricky.

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Left Click to attack

And Space or shift to dash to the mouse position.

P.S After playing through the game for the first time or wanting to get right to the action you can press P at the start of the game and it'll skip the tutorial and cutscenes.
